original_text: He shall lay his hand on the head of the burnt offering, and it shall be accepted for him to make atonement for him.
korean_text: 그는 번제물의 머리에 안수할지니 그를 위하여 기쁘게 받으심이 되어 그를 위하여 속죄가 될 것이라

sentences.original_text: He shall lay his hand on the head of the burnt offering
and it shall be accepted for him to make atonement for him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그것이 그를 위한 속죄로 받아들여지리라
